attributes.action: Strip Jimmy Savile of his Knighthood
attributes.additional_details:
Strip Jimmy Savile of his Knighthood.

The rules on honours state that:-
Someone’s who’s been given an honour and has done something to bring the honours system into disrepute can have their honour taken away.

Do not reject this application, Savile was the worst kind of predator and should not have this honour. If he was alive he would be heading for a jail sentence.
